verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Gloria Gloria Gloria to God in Heav'n above (x2)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: 1. To you alone our hean'nly King; Glory to God in heav'n above; the Mortals and the Angels sing; Glory to God in heav'n above;

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: To you alone GOD'S Son Glory to God in heav'n above; The Lamb of God; the chosen one; Glory to God in heav'n above;

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: 2. Who takes away the sins of all; Glory to God in heav'n above; Have mercy Lord and hear our call; Glory to God in heav'n above;

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Who sits at God's right hand above; Glory to God in heav'n above; have mercy Lord, O King of Love.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: 3. For you alone the Holy One; Glory to God in heav'n above; Glory to God in heav'n above; Glory to God in heav'n above;

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: For you alone are the Most High; Glory to God in heav'n above; The Trinity one Glorious God; Glory to God in heav'n above;
